BridgeFlowSource.description: The source of the bridge. A flow source originates in MediaConnect as an existing cloud flow.

properties.name: FlowArn
properties.description: The ARN of the cloud flow used as a source of this bridge.

type.description: The ARN of the cloud flow used as a source of this bridge.

properties.name: FlowVpcInterfaceAttachment
properties.description: The name of the VPC interface attachment to use for this source.

type.description: The name of the VPC interface attachment to use for this source.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the flow source.

type.description: The name of the flow source.

BridgeNetworkOutput.description: The output of the bridge. A network output is delivered to your premises.

properties.name: IpAddress
properties.description: The network output IP Address.

type.description: The network output IP Address.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The network output name.

type.description: The network output name.

properties.name: NetworkName
properties.description: The network output's gateway network name.

type.description: The network output's gateway network name.

properties.name: Port
properties.description: The network output port.

type.description: The network output port.

properties.name: Protocol
properties.description: The network output protocol.

type.description: The network output protocol.

properties.name: Ttl
properties.description: The network output TTL.

type.description: The network output TTL.

BridgeNetworkSource.description: The source of the bridge. A network source originates at your premises.

properties.name: MulticastIp
properties.description: The network source multicast IP.

type.description: The network source multicast IP.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the network source.

type.description: The name of the network source.

properties.name: NetworkName
properties.description: The network source's gateway network name.

type.description: The network source's gateway network name.

properties.name: Port
properties.description: The network source port.

type.description: The network source port.

properties.name: Protocol
properties.description: The network source protocol.

type.description: The network source protocol.

properties.name: MaxBitrate
properties.description: The maximum expected bitrate of the egress bridge.

type.description: The maximum expected bitrate of the egress bridge.

properties.name: FailoverMode
properties.description: The type of failover you choose for this flow. FAILOVER allows switching between different streams.

type.description: The type of failover you choose for this flow. FAILOVER allows switching between different streams.

properties.name: SourcePriority
properties.description: The priority you want to assign to a source. You can have a primary stream and a backup stream or two equally prioritized streams.

type.description: The priority you want to assign to a source. You can have a primary stream and a backup stream or two equally prioritized streams.

properties.name: MaxBitrate
properties.description: The maximum expected bitrate of the ingress bridge.

type.description: The maximum expected bitrate of the ingress bridge.

properties.name: MaxOutputs
properties.description: The maximum number of outputs on the ingress bridge.

type.description: The maximum number of outputs on the ingress bridge.

SourcePriority.description: The priority you want to assign to a source. You can have a primary stream and a backup stream or two equally prioritized streams.

properties.name: PrimarySource
properties.description: The name of the source you choose as the primary source for this flow.

type.description: The name of the source you choose as the primary source for this flow.

VpcInterfaceAttachment.description: The settings for attaching a VPC interface to an resource.

properties.name: VpcInterfaceName
properties.description: The name of the VPC interface to use for this resource.

type.description: The name of the VPC interface to use for this resource.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the bridge.

type.description: The name of the bridge.

properties.name: Outputs
properties.description: The outputs on this bridge.

type.description: The outputs on this bridge.

properties.name: PlacementArn
properties.description: The placement Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the bridge.

type.description: The placement Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the bridge.

properties.name: Sources
properties.description: The sources on this bridge.

type.description: The sources on this bridge.

properties.name: BridgeArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the bridge.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the bridge.
